Uses of Class
org.javalite.activejdbc.DB

  • Packages that use DB 
    Package Description
    org.javalite.activejdbc
    ActiveJDBC - the agile Java ORM.

    • Uses of DB in org.javalite.activejdbc

      Methods in org.javalite.activejdbc that return DB 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static DB Base.open()
      This method will open a connection defined in the file 'database.properties' located at root of classpath.
      static DB Base.open​(java.lang.String jndiName)
      Opens a connection from JNDI based on a registered name.
      static DB Base.open​(java.lang.String driver, java.lang.String url, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Opens a new connection based on JDBC properties and attaches it to a current thread.
      static DB Base.open​(java.lang.String driver, java.lang.String url, java.util.Properties props)
      Opens a new connection in case additional driver-specific parameters need to be passed in.
      static DB Base.open​(java.lang.String jndiName, java.util.Properties jndiProperties)
      Opens a new connection from JNDI data source by name using explicit JNDI properties.
      static DB Base.open​(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
      Opens a connection from a datasource.
      DB DB.open()
      This method will open a connection defined in the file 'database.properties' located at root of classpath.
      DB DB.open​(java.lang.String jndiName)
      Opens a connection from JNDI based on a registered name.
      DB DB.open​(java.lang.String driver, java.lang.String url, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Opens a new connection based on JDBC properties and attaches it to a current thread.
      DB DB.open​(java.lang.String driver, java.lang.String url, java.util.Properties props)
      Opens a new connection in case additional driver-specific parameters need to be passed in.
      DB DB.open​(java.lang.String jndiName, java.util.Properties jndiProperties)
      Opens a new connection from JNDI data source by name using explicit JNDI properties.
      DB DB.open​(javax.sql.DataSource datasource)
      Opens a connection from a datasource.
      DB DB.open​(ConnectionSpec spec)
      This method is used internally by the framework.
